info.name: PrivateSniper's Style :: UserStyles.org v1.5 ::
info.additionalInfo: v1.0 Removes the advert class Darkens the website, make's it easier on the eyes (nothing worse than staring at a white screen :D) v1.1 - Lol code.. cleaner code now v1.2 - Removed About Vanilla from the forums v1.3 - Removed the 3 Install Buttons for IE Opera and Greasemonkey, I use Firefox ;) v1.4 - Color Choice!! v1.5 - Removes the post install ad frame v1.6 - Enhanced color scheme, cleaner css
